data.oai_dc:dc: Geographic coordinates and genotype data for the analysis of the spatial genetic structure of the moss Sphagnum warnstorfii

Nuclear microsatellite data from Mikulášková, E. et al. (2014, Ecology & Evolution, 5, 229– 242).If you use the data in this file, please cite the original publication:Mikulášková, E., Hájek, M., Veleba, A., Johnson, M.G., Hájek, T., & Shaw, A.J. (2014) Local adaptations in bryophytes revisited: the genetic structure of the calcium-tolerant peatmoss Sphagnum warnstorfii along geographic and pH gradients. Ecology & Evolution, 5, 229– 242.
Dispersal|bryophytes|spatial genetic structure|isolation-by-distance|inverse isolation hypothesis|long-distance dispersal|spores
